layer_sequence_angle: With this function you can set the angle of rotation for the given sequence element. You supply the sequence element ID as returned by layer_sequence_create() or by one of the layer element functions along with the new angle to set and the sequence will be rotated about its origin to the new position. Angles in GameMaker are calculated with 0º to the right, and go anti-clockwise - so 90º is up, 180º is left and 270º is down - and the default angle for a sequence would be 0º.
